author: @editorji
title: Jammu-Srinagar Highway Closed Due to Landslides for Third Day | Editorji
text:
- Jammu-Srinagar highway shut for third day after landslides
- Over 500 vehicles stranded; BRO working to clear debris
- Traffic diverted to Mughal Road, Sonamarg-Kargil route
